title.narrative: NUTRTION - IMPLEMENTATION

description.narrative: Improved multisectoral coordination to prevent malnutrition and enhance effective programming for nutrition outcomes., which contributes to Adolescent Health And Nutrition, Child Health, Community-Based Management Of Acute Malnutrition, Health Systems Strengthening, Immunization, Infant And Young Child Feeding, Maternal And Newborn Health, Nutrition And Emergencies, Nutrition â€“ General, Operations Support To Programme Delivery, Prevention Of Stunting And Other Forms Of Malnutrition, Treatment Of Severe Acute Malnutrition. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2021, Botswana fully implements policies and programmes towards the achievement of the Sustainable Development Goals and targets and national aspirations.

mailing-address.narrative: 1st Floor UN Place(Annex) Matsitama Road P O Box 20678 Gaborone

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Improved multisectoral coordination to prevent malnutrition and enhance effective programming for nutrition outcomes.

description.narrative: Strengthened capacity through “Neonatal Operational and Clinical Guidelines” to contribute to reduced morbidity among 36,650 newborns annually. More than 1,800,000 COVID-19 vaccines and half a million syringes for Pfizer vaccine administration procured timely through COVAX facility to reduce severity of COVID-19 disease. At least 63,400 infants and 285,000 children under five reached with routine and catch-up immunizations from 1,237,810 vaccine doses procured with UNICEF technical support. Vitamin A supplementation reached 79 per cent of the target population. | Status:Met | As-of Date:29/12/2021
